revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Cisco Valet Plus M20.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 802.11b/g/n Gigabit Wireless HotSpot Router |caption2 = |pp = |sp = http://support.linksys.com/us/support-product?pid=01t80000003K7ZWAA0 |dl = |fandom = Cisco_Valet-Plus_M20_v1.0 |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = Supported |gargoylesupport = |brand = Cisco |model = M20 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 07/20/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Cisco_Valet-Plus_M20_v1.0 |wlclass = N300 |series = |type = wireless router |sernum = CVJ0 |fcc_id = Q87-M20 |icid = 3839A-M20 |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4716B0;BCM4716B0KFBG CS0908 P20 E10186 N1 (BCM4716B SoC); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74K |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 300 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = Serial |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = 3801088 |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5DU561622FTP-D43; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53115;BCM53115SKFBG (BCM53115); |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 68:7F:74 |oui = 68:7F:74 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = CiscoXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Cisco[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ch = |manuf = CyberTAN |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, TomatoUSB |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/25/2010 |estreldate = 03/31/2010 |estprice = |upc = 745883589388 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833186011 |asin = B003B4AVSS |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = 7.95" x 6.30" x 1.34" |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = Internal |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :The M20 shares the same hardware as the [[Linksys WRT310N v2]]. To get HT40 support in the 17804 build, telnet into the router and run the following commands.. 
nvram set wl0_nbw_cap=1
nvram set wl1_nbw_cap=1
nvram commit
reboot
While the device is not listed on the support list, it works with TomatoUSB (K2.6 NoUSB-STD) as of 10/13/2011. "3763-02010206R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. M20 serial numbers appear to start with '''CVK0'''. The default SSID is '''CiscoXXXXX''' where '''XXXXX''' is the last 5 digits of the serial number. If the device has been configured with Cisco Connect the device will probably have a [[Cisco Connect SSIDs|randomly generated SSID]]. A sample serial number is CVK01K427671 The included power adapter is a '''Bestec''' EA0121WAA. ==Links of Interest== [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cisco_Valet_Routers Cisco Valet Routers on Wikipedia]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Cisco_Valet_Plus_M20 On the DD-WRT wiki] (listed as a WiP)
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=82679 On thread of many on the DD-WRT forums], pointing to [ftp://ftp.dd-wrt.com/others/eko/V24-K26 Eko's recent builds] as supporting the M20, as of 09/08/2011 the latest build is [ftp://ftp.dd-wrt.com/others/eko/V24-K26/svn17084/dd-wrt.v24-17084_NEWD-2_K2.6_mini_m20.bin 17804] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRTNotice|microno}} {{DDWRTNotice|k26req}} Supported by dd-wrt as of = svn14471 WIP Please insert instructions here ===Flashing Tomato=== Please insert instructions here ==Upgrading== {{Upgrade dd-wrt}} ==Reverting== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=435985#435985 Support Thread] On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== VCC 1 o TX 2 o RX 3 o N/C 4 o GND 5 o ==Pictures==
